technical_debt_registry.conversation_reference: Initial context memory system setup discussion + batch editor session persistence, collaborator filters, and import transformer resolutions
technical_debt_registry.note: Initial population - needs audit and expansion

invenio_component.content: Invenio component exists in codebase but is legacy/inactive - cannot be removed currently
invenio_component.impact: Code complexity, potential confusion for developers
invenio_component.removal_blockers: Unknown dependencies or customer requirements preventing removal
invenio_component.mitigation: Ignore for new development, document clearly as legacy

django_version_upgrade.content: Django upgrade completed successfully - 3.2 â†’ 5.0.14 with full compatibility
django_version_upgrade.upgrade_approach: Aggressive single-phase upgrade with compatibility fixes
django_version_upgrade.resolution_summary: Successfully upgraded with breaking changes resolved, system fully functional

batch_editor_refresh_persistence.content: Batch editor session persistence and order preservation issues resolved
problems_resolved: Newly saved rows disappeared after refresh
Rows moved/resorted after refresh (user lost track)
Warning dialogs appeared incorrectly for selected mode
No support for empty mode (starting with blank grid)
batch_editor_refresh_persistence.solution_summary: Implemented universal patterns: sessionIds ref for persistence, order-preserving refresh via Map lookup, three-mode config format, warning dialog logic corrections

collaborator_filter_dialect_instance_ref.content: Collaborator filters referencing deprecated DialectInstance model resolved
collaborator_filter_dialect_instance_ref.problem: CollaboratorFilter methods filter_native_languages_empty and filter_other_languages_empty referenced collaborator_native_languages_dialectinstances and collaborator_other_languages_dialectinstances (deprecated)
collaborator_filter_dialect_instance_ref.solution: Replaced with native_languages__isnull=True and other_languages__isnull=True respectively
collaborator_filter_dialect_instance_ref.impact: Fixed FieldError on collaborator list page load

import_false_positives.content: Import transformer false positives for boolean and text fields resolved
problems_resolved: Anonymous field (boolean false) marked as changed due to || operator converting to empty string
Gender, Clan/Society, Origin fields marked as changed due to missing fieldTypeMap entries
Case-sensitive text comparison causing false positives
import_false_positives.solution_summary: Use ?? instead of || for default values, add all fields to fieldTypeMap, implement case-insensitive text comparison with boolean type checking
benefits_achieved: No false positives for unchanged data

virus_scanning_implementation.content: Virus scanning integration ready for development but sequenced after batch editing priorities
virus_scanning_implementation.current_state: Commented out for deployment simplicity during rapid development, not a technical blocker
virus_scanning_implementation.implementation_readiness: Ready to develop - fits into Stage 1 (public/private infrastructure)
virus_scanning_implementation.sequencing_rationale: Stage 2 (batch editing) provides more immediate value to museum staff than infrastructure work
virus_scanning_implementation.timeline: Development Stage 1 - likely second priority after batch editing
virus_scanning_implementation.complexity: Low to medium - integration patterns already established

document_to_file_transition.content: Strategic transition from Document model to File model to enable true file ingestion and better naming
document_to_file_transition.current_state: Document model handles file metadata from uploads but doesn't retain files. File model being built for true ingestion
document_to_file_transition.migration_approach: Build file management system on clean File model, then migrate data from Document to File at the end
document_to_file_transition.data_volume: Currently <100,000 records, expected to reach 10^5 order of magnitude
document_to_file_transition.complexity: Low - mostly straightforward data migration with minimal relationship complications
document_to_file_transition.timeline: Strategic priority - fits into repository management system development (Category 3)

dual_deployment_data_sync.content: Data synchronization mechanisms between public and private servers not fully implemented
dual_deployment_data_sync.completion_requirements: Bash scripts for rsync, volume configuration, bidirectional data flow

mode_specific_functionality.content: Environment variable-based mode switching and mode-specific code organization incomplete
mode_specific_functionality.impact: Cannot properly deploy to both server modes
mode_specific_functionality.completion_requirements: Clear mode detection, mode-specific feature flags, deployment configuration

endpoint_classification.content: Internal vs public endpoint classification may not be fully implemented in codebase
endpoint_classification.impact: Potential exposure of internal endpoints in public documentation
endpoint_classification.resolution_approach: Audit existing endpoints, implement proper classification system
